tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE relationships (relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                    relationship_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE entity_relationships (entity_id INT,
                        relationship_id INT,
                        FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES entities (entity_id),
                        FOREIGN KEY (relationship_id) REFERENCES relationships (relationship_id));

CREATE TABLE entities (
  entity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  entity_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE relationships (
  relationship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  relationship_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE entity_relationships (
  relationship_id UUID,
  entity_id_1 UUID,
  entity_id_2 UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (relationship_id) REFERENCES relationships(relationship_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (entity_id_1) REFERENCES entities(entity_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (entity_id_2) REFERENCES entities(entity_id)
)

CREATE TABLE entity_properties (
  property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE entity_property_mapping (
  entity_id UUID,
  property_id UUID,
  property_value TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES entities(entity_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES entity_properties(property_id)
)
